product_name: Moxie Cycling Sweetheart Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Why be traditional if you have Moxie? The Sweetheart Bike Jersey for women puts pizzazz into your ride. Striking T-shape back, sweetheart neckline in front and halter-style straps give you great style. Moxie Sweetheart Bike Jersey for women has ergonomic seams that prevent chafing. Moisture-wicking fabric moves sweat away when you're working hard and dries fast to keep you comfortable. Built-in support bra has removable cups. Backpax(TM) pocketing in back features 3 standard cycling pockets and a large, hidden zippered pouch big enough for a jacket.
short_description: Why be traditional if you have Moxie? The Sweetheart Bike Jersey for women puts pizzazz into your ride.
